TopicTitle: Hi everyone! Thought I would share with you this jaw-dropping mod..

Articles.Content:
The universe replacer mod! : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer-v3-2

Scott Manley did a video on it aswell!

Your welcome!

Yeah, we know. There's an update, by the way. You're welcome.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer-v4-0

Nice, but a PURELY aesthetic mod is about the LAST mod I'm about to use...I have enough trouble running a purely stock game on my computer, much less with the added mods "I" feel are necessary to make MY game better...

But yeah, if I had a powerful computer, yeah, I would LOVE to use this mod.
